meanings.definition: A highly flammable compound used in explosives and lacquers.
meanings.sent1: The nitrocelluloses in the factory are stored very carefully due to their flammability.
meanings.sent2: The artist used nitrocelluloses to create a shiny finish on the painting.
meanings.sent3: When the nitrocelluloses decided to have a party, they made sure to invite the fire department!
meanings.sent4: The nitrocelluloses exploded onto the scene, leaving a trail of excitement in their wake.
meanings.sent5: The smell of nitrocelluloses lingered in the air, a reminder of their dangerous nature.

meanings.definition: A type of cellulose that has been nitrated.
meanings.sent1: The company specialized in producing nitrocelluloses for various industrial applications.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of nitrocelluloses under different conditions.
meanings.sent3: The nitrocelluloses at the party were the life of the cellulose ball!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like nitrocelluloses, explosive and impactful.
meanings.sent5: The nitrocelluloses shimmered under the light, showcasing their unique composition.
